name: A Gummy's Life
description: Warning! In A Gummy’s Life, gummies have come to life… And they are unmanageable! Choose your favorite gummy among a great variety, customize it to your taste and enjoy playing and laughing with your friends or your family. Show who is in charge of the sugar!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 740 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-6500 3.2 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 960 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Recommended to play with a game pad
